qas.question: Do you have to go to the one year of kindergarten?
What seperates the children in secondary school?

context: The Canton of Bern school system provides one year of <a0_0>non<a0_0/>-obligatory kindergarten, followed by six years of primary school. This is followed by three years of obligatory lower secondary school where the pupils are separated according to <a1_0>ability and aptitude<a1_0/>. Following the lower secondary pupils may attend additional schooling or they may enter an apprenticeship.
